meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a suggestion made to a person during hypnosis that is to be carried out after the person has come out of the hypnotic state.
meanings.sent1: The posthypnotic suggestion helped the patient overcome their fear of spiders.
meanings.sent2: The therapist used a posthypnotic technique to assist the client in quitting smoking.
meanings.sent3: The posthypnotic command to dance like a chicken at the party was quite unexpected.
meanings.sent4: Her posthypnotic instructions to always smile made her seem unusually cheerful.
meanings.sent5: The posthypnotic message to remember the number 'seven' was firmly implanted in his mind.
